The expert: s verdict highlights that the claim inaccurately suggests that Congressman Brad Ellsworth voted to force seniors into "Barack Obama's government-run health care program." The expert clarifies that the health care law does not force seniors to join any plan they aren't already in, as seniors are already enrolled in Medicare. This aspect verifies that the claim misrepresents the impact of the health care law on seniors.
